group_1.textCenter: Oh... sorry, I didn't mean to drop it...

group_1.textRight: How many times have you made this mistake?

group_1.textLeft: You've been messing up, too!

group_1.textRight: *Sigh* I didn't expect we'd be playing even@more beach volleyball...

group_1.textLeft: And their team is much more in sync than ours.
What happened to all that confidence you had@earlier?

group_1.textRight: Turns out y'all were just a little friendship squad@barkin' up the wrong tree.
Grr!
We're not friends! We're just stuck working@together because we have no other choice!

group_1.textLeft: Exactly... It's impossible for us to actually work@together when it counts.

group_1.textRight: Come on! We can't just give up even though@we're losing.
That'll only make things worse...

group_1.textLeft: I'm sorry... I'm not very good at this.

group_1.textRight: It's not your fault, Akino.
...Still, the idea that we could work together and@understand each other, despite our enmity...
...Turns out it was all just a pipe dream, huh?

group_1.textLeft: ...*Inhale*
Time out!

group_1.textRight: Yeah, let's take a break.
You have a plan?

group_1.textLeft: No, sorry. That's not why I called time.

group_1.textRight: Then what was even the point?!

group_1.textLeft: Hikaru, please. Let's listen to her.

group_1.textRight: ...Fine.

group_1.textLeft: Let's be real, when this day started, I hated@your guts.
But after all this time, I feel like I've gotten to@know you a little bit better.
I was honestly shocked by how nice you can be@sometimes.
I even felt like we might be able to get along a@little.
Just a little, okay?!
...But even after all we've been through,
Once this game started, I've been paranoid@about you guys screwing up,
Or getting in our way or even undercutting us@somehow...
...I'm so ashamed of myself for thinking that way.

group_1.textRight: We've been through a lot today.
We've had no reason to trust each other at all,
So it's only logical that we would all be suspicious@of each other.

group_1.textLeft: But I liked that idea of us getting along somehow.@I don't want to think it was wrong.
I don't even care about acting for the movie or@whatever.
I just don't want to lose again. So this is my vow...
As long as we're on this beach...I trust you guys.@No more doubts.

group_1.textRight: Minami...

group_1.textLeft: Yeah! I believe in you guys, too!

group_1.textRight: Well, then, I guess I can trust you guys for the@rest of today, too.

group_1.textLeft: A Coordinator's services cannot exist without@trust.
If you put your faith in me, I promise I won't@betray you.

group_1.textRight: ...I'll make that same promise!
I'll trust you so that we can win this game@together!

group_1.textLeft: ...Thank you.

group_1.textRight: You know, we're all completely incompatible with@each other...
But I think that's precisely how we can pull@this off.
Our different personalities can compensate for@each other's shortcomings.

group_1.textLeft: That's a nice sentiment, but how exactly do we@do that?

group_1.textRight: Hmm...
Akino seems good on defense, so we'll have her@stay in the back of the court.
Just focus on receiving any serves that come@your way.

group_1.textLeft: O-okay!

group_1.textRight: That said, Akino's just a beginner.
She needs a buffer for mistakes, so Yozuru,@you need to back her up.

group_1.textLeft: I certainly will.
Um...what about me and Minami?

group_1.textRight: You two will work in tandem and run offense!

group_1.textLeft: Roger!
Kasane, you seem good at math and probability.@Use those skills to predict their moves!

group_1.textRight: *Giggle* If you insist!

group_1.textLeft: For the sake of our movie... we're gonna hit 'em@with everything we've got!
